title: You Just Described a Sugar Daddy… (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Rachel Cruze discuss:

Why you shouldn't finance a car (especially for your girlfriend),

How to set up retirement accounts,

What to do with (a lot of) extra money,

Why international funds are part of the investing strategy.


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

Christian Healthcare Ministries

NetSuite


Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.
